Desc.eng: Van Helsing! We have an urgent order from the War Council! You must find and save Private Bryan at all cost! Take him back to the Lair.
I don't care. Whole squadrons are trapped out there and they need my help more. I must protect the wounded until they get to a safe place.
Your commands have just changed. Return to the Lair and make sure it's ready to accommodate the refugees. We stay and get ready for the next attack.
We have a War Council now? And who is this soldier?
I heard that part! But who is he? Someone important?
Not that I know of. A simple soldier.
Easy, commander. I understand. If this is an order, we obey. Where should we go to look for him?
I'm all about helping people, but Count Vlados is gone, our defenses are crumbling, and you still want me to find a lonely soldier?
I sent his squadron to Track 8.
Yes, I do. I have my orders and I'm willing to sacrifice hundreds if that's what it takes to save Private Bryan!
